title: Eco-Conscious Modern Apartment near Kamienny Potok Greenery
description: Step into a bright, modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment designed for energy efficiency and contemporary comfort. Spreading across 62 sqm, this thoughtfully planned home offers a spacious open-plan living area linked by patio doors to a secluded balcony and shared garden. Solar panels and top-grade insulation embrace sustainable living. Whether you prefer a cozy breakfast by the kitchen window or working in the dedicated home office nook, this space readily adapts to your lifestyle.
neighborhood_description: Located in Sopot’s Kamienny Potok, the apartment enjoys a harmonious blend of lively urban energy and lush green surroundings. The area is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, easy cycling routes, and numerous parks and playgrounds. Excellent public transport links ensure fast access to Sopot’s seaside promenade, the Tricity tech ecosystem, shops, cafés, and cultural hubs.
target_buyer: Ideal for first-time buyers seeking an eco-conscious, contemporary home with workspace flexibility and a focus on favourable running costs.
market_positioning: This apartment stands out in Kamienny Potok’s competitive mid-range sector as a forward-thinking home for modern lifestyles, offering sustainable amenities, smart space planning, and quick connectivity to both nature and city life.
